name: 萨曼莎·朗
introduction: Samantha Long is a Digital Media Executive, Viral Personality, Celebrity Choreographer, Creative Director, Talent Manager and Award-Winning Music Video Director born in Memphis, Tennessee and living in Los Angeles, California.Long is the CEO and Founder of 'A THREAT', a female empowered brand and media company known for Co-Producing Lil Wayne's UPROAR Hip-Hop Festival in 2021, Producing music videos such as 'REI AMI' and creating original viral content distributed over the company's social media network of over 4 million followers. Through 'A THREAT', Long serves as the Creative Manager to Actress, Viral Personality & 13x TaeKwonDo World Champion, Rayna Vallandingham, who is signed to the company.As a notable figure on social media herself, Long has generated billions of views and earned millions of followers across platforms, producing one of Instagram's highest viewed videos of 2021. Long has incited some of music's biggest trends across social media, including choreographing the viral TikTok movement to Doja Cat's 'Say So' resulting in Charli D'Amellio and Addison Rae's participation in the trend.Samantha's entertainment career began as a professional dancer at the age of 9, with her dance & choreography credits now spanning from Paul McCartney and Paula Abdul, to Nicki Minaj and Janet Jackson.
